price: उनका ह़िसाब तो मेरे पालनहार ही के ज़िम्मे है, यदि तुम समझो।
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
